header.gameNote: NEW YORK LIFE ACC MEN'S TOURNAMENT - QUARTERFINAL

videos.description: Boston College's Jerome Robinson drives and kicks to Jordan Chatman who sinks a 3-pointer early in the quarterfinal game vs. Clemson.
videos.headline: Chatman's catch-and-shoot triple starts BC off

videos.description: Shelton Mitchell creates space with a crossover and sinks the 3-pointer, capping an 8-0 Clemson run.
videos.headline: Mitchell caps Clemson run with 3-pointer

videos.description: Elijah Thomas whips a pass to Anthony Oliver II in the corner, and Oliver finds nothing but net.
videos.headline: Oliver spots up in corner for Clemson 3

videos.description: Jerome Robinson drains the 3-pointer over a Clemson defender.
videos.headline: BC clawing back with Robinson 3

videos.description: Up 70-64, Clemson's Elijah Thomas snatches the offensive rebound and finishes with a dunk that has the bench flexing.
videos.headline: Thomas' putback dunk excites bench
